sentences.en: But when I started to read the journals that I'd written in my hammock each night, I realised that I'd been pretty miserable for large parts of the journey.
sentences.cn: 但是当我开始阅读在旅行中我每个夜晚在吊床上写下的文字时，我才意识到，在这次旅程的大部分时间里，我都是倍受折磨和煎熬的。

sentences.en: Hang a hammock; lie in it.
sentences.cn: 挂上一个吊床，然后躺在里面。

sentences.en: He dozing in the hammock when I called.
sentences.cn: 当我造访时他正在帆布吊床上打瞌睡.

sentences.en: He looked upwards, and saw that the dwarf was smoking in his hammock.
sentences.cn: 他抬头向上一望, 看到矮子正在吊床里喷云吐雾.

sentences.en: He swung the hammock between the trees.
sentences.cn: 他把吊床挂在两棵树之间.

sentences.en: I want to go and stretch out in a hammock.
It has skylights a hammock , and unparalleled views in every direction.
sentences.cn: 房间有天窗,吊床, 以及全方位的美景.

sentences.en: It is difficult to turn over in a hammock.

sentences.cn: 劳拉懒洋洋地躺在吊床里.

sentences.en: Many nights, I cried silently in my hammock, tears of self-pity streaming down my face.
sentences.cn: 许多个晚上，我在吊床上静静地哭泣，自伤自怜的泪水顺着脸往下淌。

sentences.en: Miss Smith was assisted from her hammock.
sentences.cn: 史密斯小姐被扶下吊床.

sentences.en: She lay in a hammock to have a rest.
sentences.cn: 她躺在吊床上休息一会.

sentences.en: The past should beasp ring board , not a hammock.
sentences.cn: “过去”应该是一块踏板, 而不是一张吊床.

sentences.en: Tom swung his hammock between the two trees.
sentences.cn: 汤姆把吊床挂在两棵树之间.

sentences.en: We anchored the hammock to the tree.
sentences.cn: 我们把吊床牢牢地系在树上.

sentences.en: We swung the hammock between two trees.
sentences.cn: 我们摇晃着挂在两树之间的吊床.

sentences.en: What does a cannibal call a man in a hammock?
sentences.cn: 食人族把吊床上的人叫做什么?

trans.tran_en: a large piece of cloth that is hung between two trees or posts so that you can sleep in it
